remoteClasses.name: Composite
remoteClasses.doc: A :rom:cls:`Hub` that mixes the :rom:attr:`MediaType.AUDIO` stream of its connected sources and constructs a grid with the :rom:attr:`MediaType.VIDEO` streams of its connected sources into its sink

params.name: mediaPipeline
params.doc: the :rom:cls:`MediaPipeline` to which the dispatcher belongs

params.name: mode
params.doc: composite mode: 0 - fixed output size, cell size is recalculated, 1 - fixed cell size, output size is recalculated

params.name: aspectX
params.doc: aspect x of a cell (fixed output size mode)

params.name: aspectY
params.doc: aspect y of a cell (fixed output size mode)

params.name: maxNColumns
params.doc: maximum number of columns in a grid (fixed cell size mode)

params.name: xyGap
params.doc: gap between cells in a grid (fixed cell size mode)
